qDef.qDef:
Num
(
    Pick
    (
     $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
        ,//MT
    Sum([Invoice MT])
        ,//Amount
       Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Net Sales'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])  /1000    
        ,//COP
        (Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Net Sales'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) 
         -Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Net Sales'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Invoice Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) )/1000
        ,// ASP/MT 
     Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Net Sales'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) / Sum([Invoice MT])
        ,// COP/MT
      (Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Net Sales'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) 
      -Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Net Sales'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Invoice Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) )/Sum([Invoice MT])
        , //Customer Count
       count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'} >}  Distinct [Customer])
        , // Country Count
         count(distinct([Geographical Country]))
         ,// Building Block
         count(distinct ([Style]))
         ,//Salesman
         count(distinct(Salesman))
      

    )
    ,
    Text
    (
      Pick
      (
          $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
          ,//MT
          'MT '&'#,##0'
          ,//Amount
          'Amt '& '#,##0'
          ,//COP
          'COP '& '#,##0'
          ,// ASPMT 
           'ASPMT '&'#,##0'
          ,// COPMT
           'COPMT '&'#,##0'
          , //Customer Count
           '#,##0' &' Cust'
          , // Country Count
          'Country '& '#,##0'
          ,// Building Block
         '#,##0'  &' BB'
          ,//Salesman
         '#,##0'  &' Salesman'


      )
   )
   , '.' , ',' )

Num
(
    Pick
    (
     $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
        ,//MT
    Sum([Budget MT])
        ,//Amount
       Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Budget'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Budget Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])  /1000    
        ,//COP
        (Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Budget'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Budget Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) 
         -Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Budget'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Budget Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) )/1000
        ,// ASP/MT 
     Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Budget'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Budget Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) / Sum([Invoice MT])
        ,// COP/MT
      (Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Budget'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Budget Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) 
      -Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Budget'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Budget Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) )/Sum([Invoice MT])
        , //Customer Count
        0
        , // Country Count
        0
         ,// Building Block
        0
         ,//Salesman
        0
      

    )
    ,
    Text
    (
      Pick
      (
          $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
          ,//MT
          'MT '&'#,##0'
          ,//Amount
          'Amt '& '#,##0'
          ,//COP
          'COP '& '#,##0'
          ,// ASPMT 
           'ASPMT '&'#,##0'
          ,// COPMT
           'COPMT '&'#,##0'
          , //Customer Count
           '#,##0' &' Cust'
          , // Country Count
          'Country '& '#,##0'
          ,// Building Block
         '#,##0'  &' BB'
          ,//Salesman
         '#,##0'  &' Salesman'


      )
   )
   , '.' , ',' )

Num
(
    Pick
    (
     $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
        ,//MT
    Sum([Invoice MT])
        ,//Amount
       Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Net Sales'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])  /1000    
        ,//COP
        (Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Net Sales'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) 
         -Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Net Sales'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Invoice Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) )/1000
        ,// ASP/MT 
     Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Net Sales'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) / Sum([Invoice MT])
        ,// COP/MT
      (Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Net Sales'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) 
      -Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Net Sales'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>}[Invoice Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) )/Sum([Invoice MT])
        , //Customer Count
       count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'} >}  Distinct [Customer])
        , // Country Count
         count(distinct([Geographical Country]))
         ,// Building Block
         count(distinct ([Style]))
         ,//Salesman
         count(distinct(Salesman))
         ,
       Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'}, [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Charge Provision By Weight Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
       
      /Sum([Invoice MT])
       
       
    
      

    )
    ,
    Text
    (
      Pick
      (
          $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
          ,//MT
          'MT '&'#,##0'
          ,//Amount
          'Amt '& '#,##0'
          ,//COP
          'COP '& '#,##0'
          ,// ASPMT 
           'ASPMT '&'#,##0'
          ,// COPMT
           'COPMT '&'#,##0'
          , //Customer Count
           '#,##0' &' Cust'
          , // Country Count
          'Cntry '& '#,##0'
          ,// Building Block
         '#,##0'  &' BB'
          ,//Salesman
         '#,##0'  &' Slsmn'
         ,
         '#,##0.00' 


      )
   )
   , '.' , ',' )

extensionMeta.name: Sheet Navigation & Actions
extensionMeta.description: Sense Sheet Navigation + Actions visualization extension for Qlik Sense.
extensionMeta.author: Stefan Walther
